info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 04 at 1:03PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR HIGH WIND AND DRY FUEL FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135, 136, AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Fire Weather Watch for high wind and dry fuel, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 135, 136 and 137. * TIMING...6AM Tuesday morning to Midnight Tuesday. * WINDS...West 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 40. * IMPACTS...a combination of dry fuel and high wind could lead to fire runs with any starts.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.
